price: On vam pokazuje znakove Svoje, pa koje od Allahovih znakova vi negirate?
arabic: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَأَيَّ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayurīkum āyātihi fa-ayya āyāti al-lahi tunkirūna
